On the sidewalk, TWO BOYS ON BIKES stop short and gape at hot moms coming down the path. Still in slo-mo, Amy nods the kids, whatup. The kids nod back, whatup to you.  57. Then Amy passes in front of her SUPER DORKY UBER DRIVER, who’s holding open the back door of his HONDA CIVIC, and slides inside...
Establishing shots of downtown Boston at night...
Hillstone is a sexy, high-end Boston hotspot. Amy, Kiki, Carla enter. Amy looks nervous...
This is one of my favorite stomping grounds.
Why?
Because it’s really fucking dark. The girls take a seat AT THE BAR. Amy glances at the menu
Hey, check out this typo: it says the drinks cost 25 dollars each!
Hilarious I love typos!
That's how much drinks cost now you fucking hicks. Amy and Kiki exchange a shocked look. Carla scans the cro
Okay let’s get to it: what kind of guys do you like?
I don’t know! I’ve only been with Mike and like three other guys... (spotting a HOT LATIN GUY) Oo, what about a Latin guy?! I’ve never been with a Latin guy before!  58.
Whoa whoa why don’t you start with a nice pudgy Jewish guy and work your way up to Latin dudes, okay--?
Excuse me, is this seat taken? The girls all turn to see a HANDSOME MAN IN A SUIT smilin Amy. Amy stammers, suddenly overcome with nerves:
Yes! No! Sit. Please. Here. As the man sits next to Amy, she hisses over to her frien
Oh my god what do I do?!
Just laugh at his jokes and agree with all the stupid shit he says-- Amy turns back to the man, smiling, trying to be cool:
I’m Amy, by the way.
(shaking her hand) Braden. I like your wedding ring. Carla face-palms. Amy blushes, stammering:
Oh, no-- I’m not-- I just found this ring on the subway!
And then you decided to wear it?
Yes! Yes. Because...it makes me feel like a...princess...?
(weirded out) Yeah I think I’m gonna sit somewhere else. The man hurries off. Amy GROANS, full of self-loathing. K leans over, smiling, ever-positive:  59.
You did great, sweetie, but maybe next time you should try it without your wedding ring on--
Yup, it’s already off. The CUTE BARTENDER approaches, friendly, throws down napk
Hey ladies, where you in from?!
Oh, we live out in Norchester with our kids! The bartender’s attention instantly cools:
Great what can I get you. As Kiki orders, Carla turns to Amy:
Also maybe don’t mention that we have children--
Yup. That was my bad. We start CUTTING QUICKLY to Amy crashing and burning with various guys around the bar: -- Amy talks to a HIP MUSIC GUY:
I love music too! Have you heard the new Ariana Grande CD?! -- Amy talks to a VERY YOUNG-LOOKING GUY:
Seriously, does your mom know you're here? -- Amy smiles at a SUPER-HIPSTER with pink-framed glasses
Why are you wearing a costume? -- Amy dabs a stain on some GUY’s shirt with a SHOUT WIPE  60.
This’ll just keep the stain from setting... The man quickly pretends to see a friend and hurries off.
Amy sits down with Kiki and Carla, defeated and depressed
Guys, I suck at this.
No you don’t. What about Donnie Wahlberg over there? Carla nods at a guy who looks kind of like DONNIE WAHLBER
Oh my god is that actually Donnie Wahlberg or is it just a guy who looks kinda like Donnie Wahlberg?!
What’s the difference?
Look, I think I just want to go home. The girls nod, sympathetic, and collect their purses... T a GROUP OF GUYS walk past, and one of them recognizes Amy
Mrs. Mitchell? Amy looks up to see JESSIE HARKNESS, the way-too-attracti English teacher at Norchester who we met in first act.
Mr. Harkness?! Instant sparks between the two of them...
Please, call me Jessie.
And I'm Amy. Hi.
What are you guys doing here?  61.
Oh, we’re having a girls night out.
Nice. So Mr. Mitchell had to stay home with the kids?
No, um, Mr. Mitchell is no longer...on the scene.
She caught him jerking off on Skype-
That’s great thank you Carla.
Oh my god, I’m so sorry... (to his FRIENDS) You guys go ahead without me. Jessie sits down next to Amy, concerned...
Are you doing okay? He touches her arm. It’s electric. Amy swallows.
I'm, you know, I’m suddenly doing a lot better? Jessie smiles, warm. Amy smiles back. Kiki just watches o grinning, wide-eyed, weird, until Carla pulls her away.
Okay creepy let’s give them some space. Come on. Carla leads Kiki off through the bar...
I can’t believe Amy is talking to Mr. Harkness! I named my vibrator after him--!
Can you not walk so close to me? I’m still trying to get laid.
Sure thing you got it!  62.
They talk by candlelight, close, intimate, connecting...

Yeah, I love teaching English. Books allow kids to talk about what they’re really feeling but are too embarrassed to say, you know? (off Amy’s dreamy gaze) Oh no am I the guy in the bar who won’t stop talking about his job?
No! No. I love how passionate you are about what you do...
You work at Coffee For The People, right?
Yes! How did you know?
I don’t know, I might've asked around about you a little bit...
What?! No way! You asked about me?
Yeah! I’ve always had a thing for you, you know that... Amy stammers, blown away...
Actually...I did not know that...
Really? I always felt like I made it way too obvious... A beat. Then Amy lunges and KISSES him--
Oh my God! He quickly pulls away. Amy is mortified:
I’m so sorry! I haven't done this in a really long time!  63.
No it was great, you just scared the shit out of me! She laughs, embarrassed... Then he cradles her face gentl and kisses her properly...

Carla flirts with Donnie Wahlberg-- until Kiki spasticall hits her, look look look! Carla turns to see Amy kissing Jessie, and smiles, nice. Then Kiki raises her phone to t a photo of them, and Carla slaps her hand down.
The sun rises. Birds chirp. Love is in the air.

Amy wakes up in her bed, still glowing from the night bef Her phone RINGS with a text. She quickly grabs it, reads: TEXT FROM JESSIE: “Nice seeing you last night Mrs. Mitche Amy grins and TEXTS back: “The pleasure was all mine Mr. Harkness.” Amy holds the phone close, and smiles up at the ceiling..
Amy bounds down the stairs, breezes into the kitchen...an SCREAMS! Sitting, eating cereal, reading US Weekly, is MI
What up babe.
What--?! What are you doing here?!
I want to get back together. I never should have left you, that was a total dick move.
What are you talking about? Three days ago you told me you had feelings for another woman.  64.
I know but then I met her in person and she’s super weird.
So that’s why you want to get back together with me?!
No! That’s not the only reason... (thinking) I also miss Jane and Dylan. Mostly Dylan, but I miss Jane too. Mike searches for forgiveness, but Amy isn’t buying it...
Look I just needed a break. Haven't you ever just needed a break?
Of course I have, but I didn’t blow up my family to do it.
Mark Feinstein facetimed with a hooker and his wife took him back.
I don’t give a fuck about Mark Feinstein.
Look, here’s the deal: I love our kids and I'm willing to do whatever it takes to fix our marriage.
You’d even go to therapy?
No way therapy is dumb! Amy starts physically shooing Mike towards the door.
Great, thanks for stopping by.
Come on Aim, don’t be a dick! I’m trying to do the right thing here-- They reach the door, and Mike stops, panicked:  65.
Okay okay! Even though it’s a total waste of time and money...and a little gay...I will go to therapy. Amy looks at him, highly skeptical...
And you really gotta get into it too. Like you gotta feel stuff and cry and talk about your fucked up family and the whole thing.
Babe I haven't cried since the Sox traded Nomar in ‘04.
(shoving him out) Great, have fun on Skype--
Okay okay I’1l1 cry! I’1l cry the whole fucking time! Jesus! Maybe while we're at therapy we can also talk about how you’re a little crazy sometimes--
Goodbye, Mike.
So are we doing therapy or what?
I’1l think about it.
Can I get my US Weekly back because I was in the middle of an article about Khloe Kardashian-- Amy SLAMS the door on his face and stares off, conflicted

Amy strolls through a hallway near the gym. FEMALE SOCCER PLAYERS hustle to and fro... Then Amy sees Jane, in her uniform and cleats, sitting on a bench outside Coach Pate office, CRYING. Amy races over, concerned:  66.
Oh no baby what’s wrong?
Coach just told me I’m not starting! I’m a benchwarmer!
What?! But you’re the best forward on the team!
Oh my God my life is ruined I’m never going to college I might as well just become a prostitute!
Okay okay, settle down. Momma’s gonna fix this, okay? Jane nods, trying to pull herself together...
Okay but please don’t make a scene.
Of course not, baby. Amy looks at her daughter reassuringly, then turns and ki open COACH'S OFFICE DOOR! Inside COACH PATEL spins, sees and how pissed she is, and blurts out, terrified:
Gwendolyn made me!

head_text.subj: GWENDOLYN HOSTING A P.T.A. TEA IN THE LIBRARY

text: Gwendolyn sits with a group of PROPER MOMS in the library wearing fancy hats and drinking tea out of tea cups...

.+-my goal is to make this year’s PTA luncheon the greatest luncheon this school has ever seen. One of the MOMS LAUGHS, assuming she’s joking. Gwendolyn shoots her an icy look. The Mom silences, shrinks. Just then AMY blows in, furious:
How dare you bench my daughter!  67. The proper moms startle and turn to see Amy, her eyes afi
Oh hello, Amy. How are you?
You had no right to do that!
Actually I did. Soccer is a PTA sponsored activity, and I’m the president of the PTA, so... This is clearly news to Amy... She stammers, floundering:
Okay...well...you know... (then, getting an idea) Not for long.
Oh dear, what does that mean?
It means I’m gonna run against you for PTA president!
You can’t be serious...
I'm sick of you running this school like a dictator! It sucks!

I'm really sorry, ladies, Amy's husband recently left her and she’s going through a bit of a mental breakdown right now. Amy GASPS, shocked... The MOMS recoil, embarrassed for he Amy points at Gwendolyn, her blood boiling:
I'm coming for you Gwendolyn!
Okey doke! Amy storms out. Gwendolyn smiles, completely unworried.
Amy paces in her living room, still amped up, as Kiki and Carla counsel her.
There is no way you can beat her! Gwendolyn has been PTA president for the last six years!
I know, but she messed with my kid, and I can’t let that stand.

Right, but Gwendolyn controls all the voting blocs. She’s got The Attachment Moms, The Tiger Moms, The Sad Moms, The Drunk Moms, The Divorced Moms, The Black Moms, The Lesbian Moms -- she even has the Divorced Black Lesbian Moms, and that is not an easy group to win over. Amy frowns, starting to realize just how impossible this going to be... KIKI (CONT’D) Plus if you lose Gwendolyn will destroy you. She’1l put your kids in all the dumb classes and give them all the crappy teachers and forget about soccer -- your kids won’t even get milk!

But isn’t that exactly why we need to take her down? She’s a bully, and she wants to turn us all into perfect little Nazi moms just like her and she wants all our kids to be hyper-stressed over-scheduled freaks and I don’t want that! My daughter has a new rash every week and she’s only 16! We gotta fight back against these perfect moms!
You had me at Nazi -- let’s punch this chick right in the tits. Amy looks over at Kiki, hopeful...  69.
I still think it’s a really bad idea with long-term ramifications for your children but okay let’s do it I’m totally in!
Okay! Let’s get started!

head_text.subj: AMY XEROXING THOUSANDS OF CAMPAIGN FLYERS AT WORK

text: as she looks over her shoulder for her boss coming...

Amy, Kiki, and Carla enthusiastically hand out campaign flyers to MOMS picking up their kids for the day... Amy staples a flyer to the SCHOOL KIOSK that reads “AMY F PTA PRESIDENT! COME MEET THE CANDIDATE TOMORROW NIGHT!” Kiki slides flyers under car windshield wipers... Carla tries to hand flyers to a group of MOMS walking pas only they refuse them. Carla chases after them, yelling a them to take the damn flyers. The moms literally jog away GWENDOLYN removes one of Amy’s flyers from the windshield her Range Rover. She reads it and smirks, smug...
Finished with flyering, Amy, Kiki and Carla eat dinner in this casual family restaurant while all their KIDS eat at next table over. The moms are in a great mood:
So how many moms do you think are gonna come to your Meet The Candidate Night?!

I told all the moms that if they didn’t come I would fuck their husbands so hopefully we’ll have decent numbers. Amy laughs...then notices her daughter studying a textboo stressed, over at the kids’ table. Amy frowns, concerned:  70.
Jesus that kid never stops studying...
You're lucky. All my kid does with books is try to rip them in half.

I’m trying so hard to get her to chill out and take life less seriously, and sometimes I feel like I’m doing an okay job, but then like two seconds later I feel like I’m failing miserably. I just wish I knew how I was doing, you know?
Yeah, the most frustrating part of being a mom is you have no idea if you're doing a good job or not until your kids are fully grown.
Yeah, and then it’s too late. They're either cool or they’re meth head serial killers.

The worst part is Jane is exactly like me -- she wants everything to be perfect and of course all that does is drive you completely insane. Luckily Dylan turned out like his dad and he’s lazy as shit. The moms look over at their kids...
Yesterday I gave Bernard the wrong juice box and he called me a cunt.
My son still watches Sesame Street.
My daughter stole money from a homeless woman.
I have no idea who Jaxon’s dad is.  71.
My son failed Study Hall. The school said no one has ever done that before.
Clare killed our neighbor’s ferret and we all pretended it was an accident but it wasn’t.
I don’t like my kid.
One time I left Bernard at the mall on purpose. The moms frown at their kids, troubled...
But fuck I love them so much.
Me too I would literally die for them right now.
Every time I think about that big dumb motherfucker going off to college I cry like a baby... Carla looks at her giant son, growing emotional.
Damn you’re gonna make me cry too.
(pouring tears) I’m already going! Look at me! Children are such a gift! OVER AT THE KIDS’ TABLE The kids glance over and see their moms all crying togeth
What are they crying about now?
Who cares. They’re so weird.
Another sunrise over Amy's house... INT. AMY’S KITCHEN -- MORNING Amy brews coffee while Dylan grumpily makes himself a bow cereal for breakfast next to her. Milk splashes all over.
Cooking is hard.
I know, right?
Hey, so where’s my science project?
Oh. I didn’t do it.
What?! But it’s due today!
Yeah, from now on you’re actually gonna have to do your own homework.
WHAT?! That’s so unfair!
Oh boy--
I’m a slow learner, remember?! I need help!
You're not a slow learner, sweetie, you're just really entitled. Do you know what entitled means?
No! Because I'm a slow learner!
It means mommy and daddy have been spoiling you and now you think the world owes you something, but it doesn’t. (MORE )

And if you don’t learn how to work hard now, you’re gonna grow up to be just another entitled white dude who thinks he’s awesome for no reason and you’ll start a ska band and it’ll be so terrible and you’1l be mean to girls and you’1ll grow an ironic mustache to look interesting but you won’t actually be interesting and I really don’t want to be responsible for putting that kind of poison into the world, so just do your homework, okay?
Fine. Jesus. Dylan heads off with his cereal, totally eviscerated...
Coffee for the People is as casual as ever. Young hipster play ping pong, ride scooters, and drink coffee. A DJ spi Amy enters, smiling, and strolls over to Tessa’s desk...
Hey man, Dale was asking about your hotel project. He seemed really miffed. Do you want to work on that this morning?
Nah. I think I’m gonna work as hard as everyone else today... Amy walks right past Tessa to the NEAREST PING PONG TABLE where TWO HIPSTER DUDES are playing:
I got next.

head_text.subj: AMY KICKING ASS IN PING PONG

text: She dominates the hipsters, smashing impossible shot afte impossible shot! CO-WORKERS gather around, impressed. Amy high-fives one of them after hitting a great shot! WOOO!  74.
Oh my God this is so fun! Why didn’t I play with you guys before?!
I don’t know. You’re surprisingly good for your age.
Hey, you wanna come to karaoke lunch with us?!
Nah, I’m gonna eat a yogurt at my desk and work on my hotel accounts. The ping pong guys nod, not surprised...
I’m just fucking with you! Let’s go make some music! They all LAUGH and exit. Tessa watches Amy go, concerned.
Amy ties BALLOONS onto a sign mounted next to her front d reading “MEET THE CANDIDATE NIGHT, COME ON IN!”
Amy and Kiki set up a very casual wine & pizza party whil Carla reclines on the couch reading a magazine.
Where are your kids tonight?
Staying with my very old neighbor.
Is he hot?
Knock knock? Amy looks over to see a LESBIAN COUPLE standing in the op front doorway. Amy crosses, welcoming them:
Hi guys, come in, come in!  75. The women enter.
Sorry no one’s here yet.
Yeah we figured, what with Gwendolyn’s party and all...
Wait, what?
Oh, you didn’t know? Gwendolyn heard you were having a campaign party so she threw a competing party at her house. Amy, Kiki, Carla exchange a shocked look.
That fucking whore!
Yeah -- and she has Wolfgang Puck.

head_text.subj: WOLFGANG PUCK SLICING PRIME RIB AT A BUFFET

text: in Gwendolyn’s beautiful mansion. The buffet is stocked w every food imaginable, and the house is packed with MOMS, eating and whispering about how delicious everything is.. Then GWENDOLYN breezes in like the belle of the ball in s ludicrous dress, smiling and greeting people as she passe

Wolf the crab is divine! The program will start in five minutes ladies! In the meantime please enjoy Koko Malumbo and the Nigerian Boys Choir! Gwendolyn smiles at an AFRICAN CHILDREN’S CHOIR in the co as they launch into a cover of “Teach Your Children.”
Amy, Carla, Kiki and the Lesbian Moms sit on the floor of Amy's living room, eating pizza and drinking wine, depres  76.
I can’t believe Gwendolyn would do this...
I’m so sorry, sweetie...
I know a guy who’ll burn her house down if that’s a call you want me to make. Amy just frowns at all the CASES OF CHEAP WINE in the cor
What are we gonna do with all this wine...?
INT. GWENDOLYN’S MANSION -- NIGHT The MOMS sit in rows of chairs in Gwendolyn’s huge living room, listening to her give a speech into a headset mic:

...raising children capable of competing in the global marketplace isn’t just an economic issue, it’s a matter of national security. To discuss this issue further, I'd like to welcome the Former Head of CENTCOM, General David Petraeus. IMPRESSED APPLAUSE as DAVID PETRAEUS makes his way to the front of the room. Gwendolyn takes a seat next to a MOM..
So sorry to bother you, Gwendolyn, but where's your bar?
That's really not what tonight is about, Cara. Gwendolyn smiles tartly. The mom frowns. Then she covertl pulls out her phone and texts: DOES AMY HAVE BOOZE?

head_text.subj: AMY CHUGGING A GLASS OF WINE

text: and then HIGH-FIVING the Lesbian Mom next to her! The mom are sitting on the floor, buzzed, playing that drinking g where you hold your iPhone to your forehead. Everyone is laughing and yelling and having a blast:
Why do I have to drink again?!
Because you said the clue word!
What--?! I don’t understand how this game works! Fuck! Laughing, Amy drinks more wine as the moms keep playing.

Hello--? The moms all turn to see the THIRSTY MOM entering Amy’s house. The second she sees the game they’re playing, she chucks her purse aside and charges inside, psyched: THIRSTY MOM (CONT’D) Oh hell yes!
INT. GWENDOLYN’S MANSION -- NIGHT Petraeus sits as Gwendolyn stands, addressing the MOMS:

Thank you General Petraeus. Now for the next 45 minutes I would like to talk to you about the advantages of year-round school... A BORED MOM in the audience gets a TEXT on her phone. She opens it-- and startles to see it’s a SELFIE OF THE THIRS MOM drunkenly flipping them the bird while Amy, Kiki, Car and the lesbian moms don gangsta poses all around her! It looks crazy fun! The text reads: COME TO AMY’S U BITCHES! Wide-eyed, the mom looks around and sees that ALL THE MOM GWENDOLYN’S HOUSE are getting the same text -- and smilin

A LINE OF MOMS STREAMING INTO AMY’S HOUSE! Old school hip hop plays and A FEW MOMS dance with each o in Amy’s living room, happy and free! Amy circulates with bottles of wine, pouring drinks for everyone who wants on DRUNK MOM grabs Amy, looks her in the eye:
This is the best PTA meeting ever!
INT. GWENDOLYN’S MANSION -- NIGHT Gwendolyn watches the last MOMS hurry out of her mansion.
You sure you can’t stay?
Sorry I only have my sitter til 9! The moms race out, leaving Gwendolyn’s giant house empty for VICKY and MEAN STACY. Gwendolyn frowns, disturbed...
Well. That ended a lot earlier than I expected...
You don’t think...they’re all going to Amy’s party, do you?
Don’t be fucking stupid Vicky, we had Wolfgang Puck and David Petraeus, what does she have? An awkward silence. MEAN STACY (CONT’D) GWENDOLYN We should go. I’ll drive.
Gwendolyn, Mean Stacy and Vicky drive through Norchester night, tense, looking for Amy’s street...
I’m sure her party is super-lame. Amy is so poor. They turn down Amy’s street...and their jaws drop:  79.

Holy shit. Amy's party is going off! MINIVANS clog both sides of the street as MOMS eagerly stream into Amy’s house! BASS THUM as MOMS drink and laugh on Amy’s front porch. One MOM alr lies face down on Amy’s front lawn, passed out. Gwendolyn, Stacy, and Vicky stare in disbelief... Then:
That looks awesome!
A line of moms down shots then slam down their glasses do on the dining room table! Carla yells at them: ANOTHER!

The entire room is now packed with MOMS dancing like wome who haven’t cut loose in years -- wild, reckless, alive! TIGER MOMS dance with ATTACHMENT MOMS dance with WAY TOO JEWISH MOMS dance with GAY DADS dance with WORKOUT MOMS..
KIKI AND ANOTHER MOM show adorable pictures of their kids each other on their phones -- until Carla blows past, SWA their phones to the floor, and charges onward, insane!
as everyone CLAPS and CHEERS her on! She spins around and around and even tries to helicopter on her head... IN AMY’S BEDROOM A WEIRD MOM garishly paints her face with Amy’s make-up..
Carla makes out with ONE OF THE LESBIAN MOMS, then turns makes out with the OTHER LESBIAN MOM...
A MOM shows KIKI how to do whippets out of a Cool Whip ca
THREE MOMS drunkenly do double-dutch while ANOTHER MOM st on a dirt-bike, expertly bouncing on one wheel, while nea WOLFGANG PUCK smokes a joint with TWO HIPPY MOMS, laughin  80.
Amy dances with the mob of women, having a blast, until t song finally ends. Then CARLA stands on Amy's coffee tabl
The moms APPLAUD as Amy climbs up onto her coffee table. of view, GWENDOLYN, MEAN STACY, and VICKY quietly slip in the back of the room and listen...

Hey guys, thanks for coming out! I don't have a speech or anything, I just wanted to say that I think we all do way too much stuff, and if I'm elected we’re gonna start doing way less! Less PTA meetings, less bake sales, less luncheons, less bullshit! The moms ROAR their approval! In the back, Gwendolyn look genuinely surprised by the moms’ fury...

Our kids need a break too! School starts way too early! And why do they have six hours of homework a night?! Our kids have no time to be kids anymore! And do they really need to take five standardized tests a week?! We shouldn’t be teaching our kids to be good test takers we should be teaching them to be good people! Even MORE RABID APPLAUSE. Gwendolyn rolls her eyes...
Who gives a shit if our kids don’t go to Harvard?! My boss went to Harvard and he’s a total douche! The crowd CHEERS as Gwendolyn looks horrified...
Also I think we should all stop doing Zumba! There’s no science supporting it plus you look super embarrassing when you do it!  81. The crowd hesitates a bit, not...totally...behind her...

Okay I could be wrong about Zumba, but I think I’m right about the other stuff! So if you're tired of being overworked and under- appreciated and if you’re tired of your school making you feel like shit while slowly driving your kids insane or if you’re just a mom who wants to do less, then vote for me! THE CROWD GOES NUTS! Smiling, Amy steps down from the cof table as MOMS swarm her, hugging her, high-fiving her, ta photos with her like she’s famous! Some are even crying:
I love you so much Amy Mitchell!
Can we have a playdate?! I want a playdate with you so fucking bad!
I will do whatever you tell me to.

head_text.subj: IN THE BACK OF THE ROOM

text: Gwendolyn, Stacy and Vicky stare in disbelief:
This basic bitch is going to win the election...
No she’s not -- because I’m gonna hit her where it counts.
You're going to punch her in the vagina?!
I literally don’t even know why we hang out with you anymore.
Because our kids play lacrosse-- But Gwendolyn is gone. Stacy and Vicky hurry out after he  82.
The party is over -- and Amy’s house is decimated. Bottle cups, and trash are everywhere. Amy, Kiki and Carla sit o the kitchen counter, eating cookie dough from a tube, hap
You know the best thing about a mom party? Everyone leaves at 11:00.
I made out with a lot of women tonight.

I really like whippets--! MAN’S VOICE IN HALLWAY (0.S.) Hello? Amy looks at her friends, confused. Then JESSIE appears i the kitchen doorway, ruggedly handsome -- and a bit confu Amy straightens, surprised:
Oh hey! What are you doing here?
Umm, you kind of...booty-texted me?
What?! Carla hops off the counter and grabs Kiki--
Great party Aim we’ll see ya later. Carla and Kiki hurry out. Amy smiles, understanding...
I'm sorry, I think Carla booty- texted you with my phone.
Thank god, because what she wrote was deeply disturbing. Amy laughs. Then there’s an awkward pause.
So should I...like...go? Amy looks at him...considers...  83.

No. You really shouldn't. A beat. Then they start making out like crazy, driving ea other around the kitchen, upsetting glasses, bowls, plate With his free arm, Jessie clears the kitchen counter and bottles and cans CRASH to the floor! He lifts Amy up onto counter as she pulls off his shirt! Amy stops for a secon and takes in his incredibly chiselled physique:
Oh fuck yeah. She pulls him down on top of her OUT OF FRAME...
INT. AMY’S BEDROOM -- LATER THAT NIGHT Amy and Jessie collapse back on her bed, sweaty, exhauste post-coital. Amy smiles, extremely satisfied.
Mm, that was nice... Jessie just stares at the ceiling, wide-eyed, his mind bl
I don’t-- I can’t-- What was that thing you did at the end?
I don’t know. I just came up with it in the moment.
Honestly, that was by far the best I’ve ever had.
Really? Aww... Amy smiles, a bit proud. Jessie looks over at her, smitte
I’ve never met a woman like you before, Amy...
That’s because you’re very young and you haven’t met a lot of people yet. But thanks, you’re very sweet.  84.
Can I go down on you again?
Ya! Sounds great! Jessie grins and eagerly scoots downward...
It’s very late and the school is dark and empty and omino Then Gwendolyn’s Range Rover quietly pulls up and Gwendol Stacy, and Vicky get out and make for the entrance...
I still don't understand what we're doing here!
That's because you're fucking stupid. Gwendolyn unlocks the front door and they slip inside...
